description:
SURPRISE!
I tricked ya! I'm hoping you thought that when you voted for the "Next Edge" model that you thought the other models wouldn't be given the Edge treatment.
Nope! All your votes did was determine the order that they would air! Each one airing everyday in a row!
Everyone WINS!
CAUTION! Three video releases in one weekend is gonna slow the site down. Be prepared for some server slowness!
Sooooo, you guys voted and picked Robert as who you wanted to see next in the Edge chair!
I gotta tell you, Robert was awesome during this video. He really pushed his limits - even attempting some cock sucking for the first time ever!
This is a pretty dang good video, having all the elements of what should make an Edge video perfect: Straight guy boundaries pushed, lots of naughty fantasy sequences, and a VERY intense cumshot as he practically falls out of his chair when he cums!
Once again, I pushed the length of the fantasy sequences, also putting them more together to be a bit more cohesive. Eh...I don't really like it this way, but I think its cuz I have to edit the video and get very critical of my own appearance. I keep getting requests to extend them, and I think this is as far as I'm gonna push it.
Enjoy!
title: Bryan & Robert - Edge
